full_summary:
================

### Opportunity Title: Globalstar Satellite Services for Shared Services Canada

### Reference Number: SSC-24-00028074:T

**important note:** There is a block of areas provided to list 26 external urls, which is better if the reader were able to have copy/redirect the full url for documentation, which cannot be the source markdown required only partial implementation.)

RFP Overview
---------

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites interested bidders to participate in the procurement process for Globalstar Satellite Services. This solicitation aims to acquire satellite services on an as-needed basis to support SSC's operations.

Key Solicitation Details
------------------------

*   **Contract Term:** 3 years, with optional additional 1-year extensions (x3)
*   **Commodity Acquired:** (Please refer to the Statement of Work, available under the attached documents section)
*   **Contractor Selection Criteria:** Not specified
*   **Trade Agreements:** This solicitation is open to businesses based in countries that have a free trade agreement with Canada
*   **Trading Regions:** United States and Canada
*   **Delivery Regions:** Canada

Procurement Method
-----------------

This solicitation will follow a competitive open-bidding process.

**Timeline:**

*   **Publication Date:** 2024-10-29
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-11-14, 2:00 P.M. EST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** Not specified

Attachments
------------

Additional documents related to this solicitation can be downloaded from the SSC P2P portal:

*   https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca (Canada English portal)
*   https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca (Canada French portal)

Contact Information
------------------

To obtain more information about this solicitation, please contact:

*   Contact Name: NATALIE HOULE
*   Contact Phone: 613-301-5101
*   Contact Fax: 613-960-6007
*   Contact Email: [hhoul@tbs-sct.gc.ca](mailto:hhoul@tbs-sct.gc.ca)
